description.en:
From Aerandria Scans:

Princess Tsubaki, who loves romantic stories, is told by her father, the king, to choose a guy to date at her 16th birthday party at all costs. Troubled by this, princess Tsubaki asked a favor of Aoi, a boy who’s treated like a Cinderella...?!

Also includes the following stories:

Funny Work After School
Maki loves decorating things and lets out her passion in the Handicraft Club. However, in class, she's passive in order to hide her over-enthusiastic personality. When a boy she knows from her childhood joins the Handicraft Club, will her true personality be exposed?

Star Falling Gift
Although Miri is rich and can't do anything, she hates being treated like a kid. She will only eat her housekeeper's gruel for breakfast. So when the housekeeper leaves for a trip, she has her "granddaughter" who can make the same gruel substitute for her...

Quartet Carta
Nishihara Miyo was one out of four chosen to represent her class in karuta (cards of one hundred famous poems game) contest. With her timidity and lack of confidence, will she be all right?
